name: Stick Man
description:
I Dont Know How To Explain This Game

To Play Just Download Unzip And Run Main.exe.

If It Dose Not Work.

  • Make Sure It Has All Other Files/Folders.
  • Delete And Re-download.
  • Make Sure You Have Un-Zipped It.

Random Notes:

  • Enemy Randomly Moves.
  • Arrows To Move.
  • Tab To Land.
  • Space To Jump.
  • When Going On Screen You Teleport To The Other Side Of The Screen Like In Pacman.
  • You Have 5 Lives

Email Me At zobblestonehelp@gmail.com If You Need Help.
